results.title: Anti-phishing policies in Microsoft 365 - Microsoft Defender for Office 365
results.description: Anti-phishing policies in cloud organizations Tip Did you know you can try the features in Microsoft Defender for Office 365 Plan 2 for free. Use the 90-day Defender for Office 365 trial at the Microsoft Defender portal trials hub. Learn about who can sign up and trial terms on Try Microsoft Defender for Office 365. Anti-phishing policies protect.

results.title: How does Microsoft 365 Copilot work?
results.description: Your data is secured based on existing security, compliance, and privacy policies already deployed by your organiz... This article describes how Microsoft 365 Copilot works, including the data flow in a user prompt, how Copilot access data, and how Copilot honors Conditional Access and multifactor authentication (MFA). This article applies to:.
